title: Sighting at Camp Oyo Boy Scout Camp on Rt. 125
observed: While taking a break during a hike back from the Lou Wetzel cabin, we were sitting at a picnic area just below the Clark cabin when we seen a creature walking upright on it's hind legs with long brown hair and piercing green eyes. We was only able to see from the waist up due to the brush.
location_details: Camp Oyo Boy Scout Camp on Rt. 125
